properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Adyantha rahitha prabhuvaa raajulaku raajaa Prabhu yesoo neeve sadaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aadi janakudu edenu thotalo shodhanalo padi vedhinchi Napudu aashalanni adiyaashalugaa jese adhamulanu Neevu aadarinthuvu amrutha moorthy neeve prabhoo Saati neekevaru ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Staanamu vidachi thana mahima vidachi anudinamu ninu Dooshinchu vairi pradhaanathwamunu paaduchesukoni Nee prabhuthwamun niraakarinchina neechun preminchitivi Prabhoo saati neekevaru ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pilichitivi Ishraayelu santatini velakoladi vaaghdhana Mulatho kalimi yanduna kalatha landuna tholigi poyina Thalladillina challaga kaachitivi prabhoo Saati neekevaru ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Raajyameliri raaraaju lendaro raaja nagarula ratnaala Sirulatho raajya kankshatho ranamulu salipiri Radhamulanu choochi sadayun marachina nitya Saathvikudavu prabhoo saati neekevaru ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parama janakuni palu vaakku lenniyo dharanu prajalaku Pravachinchu korakai nirnayinchitivi daiva janulanu Peraasha kaligi peda throva nadachina karuninchitivi Vaarin prabhoo saati neekevaru ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paadedan prabhoo nee prema geetam padi chedina nannu Preminchitivani kadigitivi prabhu kalushamu nella Vidachina nenu neejaada lanniyu nadipinche naavikudaprabhoo Saati neekevaru ?{/lang-eng}
